PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PipeConnectionFlanged
PropertySetDef.Definition: This property set is used to define the specifics of a flanged pipe connection used between occurrences of pipe segments and fittings.

PropertyDef.Name: FlangeTable
PropertyDef.Definition: Designation of the standard table to which the flange conforms.

PropertyDef.Name: FlangeStandard
PropertyDef.Definition: Designation of the standard describing the flange table.

PropertyDef.Name: BoreSize
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal bore of the pipe flange.

PropertyDef.Name: FlangeThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: Thickness of the material from which the pipe bend is constructed.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfBoltholes
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of boltholes in the flange.

PropertyDef.Name: BoltSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the bolts securing the flange.

PropertyDef.Name: BoltholePitch
PropertyDef.Definition: Diameter of the circle along which the boltholes are placed.
